mapper.sql: id, userId, serial_number, create_time, update_time, bagsNum, recycle_site_name, status, orc_id, recycle_site_id
mapper.select:
select
from recycle_bin where status= "0" and recycle_site_id= #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update recycle_bin set userId = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bagsNum = #{bagsnum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, recycle_site_name = #{recycleSiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orc_id = #{orcId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, recycle_site_id = #{recycleSiteId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
